participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Friendly and curious, she enjoys engaging with others and learning about different cultures.
participant_1.background: Emma grew up in a small town and has always had a passion for traveling and meeting new people.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and approachable, he loves to share stories and connect on a personal level.
participant_2.background: Liam is a city dweller with a diverse upbringing, and he values communication and understanding in his relationships.
